Title: Private key compromise
Description: Compromise of sidecar private key enables identity spoofing and lateral movement within mesh

Title: CA compromise or mis-issuance
Description: Compromised or misconfigured CA can issue valid identities for any service
Primary Control: Hardened CA + strict CSR validation + audit logs

Title: Over-permissive mesh policy
Description: Authorization policies allow unintended service-to-service access
Primary Control: Least-privilege mesh policies + policy review process

Title: CI/CD config tampering
Description: Malicious policy or trust anchor promoted via pipeline
Primary Control: Signed artifacts + protected branches + approval gates

Title: Handshake flood DoS
Description: Repeated TLS handshakes exhaust proxy CPU and impact availability

Title: Sensitive data leakage in logs
Description: Headers or payload data logged by proxy expose secrets

Title: Policy change without audit trail
Description: No audit record of who changed authorization policy

Title: Trust bundle tampering
Description: Sidecars accept malicious CA due to altered trust bundle

Title: Node compromise exposing certs
Description: Compromised node exposes sidecar secrets and decrypted traffic
